name: Snow in September
description:
The snow belongs to the Winter King, hidden away in a far-off castle. She can follow the strange creature all the way there. If only a certain someone would stop interrupting her daydreams. 

WASD or arrows to move. Some say you may need the mouse as well.

--

This game is largely unfinished. There's no sounds, no music, no in-game menu. There's a general lack of polish and detail. As usual, I overestimate how much I can get done in a short number of days, especially as an amateur solo developer. However, it was a good learning experience for more demanding animations, as well as more finicky coding. Sticking objects to curves took a long time to figure out and, even though the code is... crude at best, it is fundamentally something I can re-use for later experimentation.
